name: YOU EMPOWER ME
description:
In this bullet hell game, you play as a little dwarf who can choose how upgrades for his enemy. You can play the short story mode, replay it with different upgrades or try to beat your best score in the arcade mode. This game was made in the tophat engine as a submisson to the fourth nokia game jam.

The source code is available as public domain here.

Controls movementarrows navigate menuarrow up and down confirm choice in menuenter advance to upgrade menuarrow down Upgrade explanations

The upgrades aren't explained in the game, so refer to this.

lasersrandomly spawns laser stations that shoot a laser blocksrandomly spawns blocks that instantly kill the player upon collision sine bulletsshoots bullets travelling in a sine wave bigger sine waveincreases the magnitude of the sine wave the bullets travel in
